Jugué, me lo pasé, y lo abandoné. Empecé la segunda parte, me lo pasé normal, coop, coop con un amigo que nunca había jugado, mapas de la comunidad y...

Es un puto VALVE MUST, hay que comprarlo si o si.

If this game is on sale for a couple of bucks and youve never played it before, its worth grabbing a copy just for the AI, and that oh-so-glorious endgame credits theme song.

Its not a very long game though, so if your looking to get something to sink some time in to, this is not that game; all in all it should only take 1.5-3 hours to go from start to finish. Not a whole lot of replay value to it either, aside from that AI.

Still a fun playthrough, and for a couple of bucks, you cant beat the games personality.

Oyun süper ötesi bişeyya.Beyninizin yüzde yüzünü kullanmak zorunda kalıyorsunuz.Bulmucalarda tamemen akla dayalı hıza değil.Grafikleri güzel olmasada oynatıyor.Oynayın görün.

İlk girişten sonra oyunun konusu bitane şirketin (adını unuttum) bize testler uyguluyor ve bizi gözlemliyor.Bize komut veren şeyler ise bir tane robot.Bu şirketin amacı ise Black Mesa (Evet oyunu yeni çıktı) araştırma merkeziyle yarış içinde olması.Ve bizde değişik şeyler bulması Oyun çok kısa düşüne düşüne en çok 3 saatte biter.Ancak youtube'den bakmayın heyacanı kaçıyor.

Grafikler: 6/10

Fizik: 10/10

Ortam: 7/10

Le jeu en lui même n'est pas très long, mais l'ambiance et le concept relèvent du génie. Ce jeu m'a vraiment étonné jusqu'au bout. Les maps bonus et les défis permettent une assez grande rejouabilité, surtout si on veut être gold. Et je me méfierai la prochaine fois qu'on m'invitera à manger du gâteau.

This is probably one of the best purchases i have made on Steam, insane value for the small price it costs.

must play game!

Portal é uma das melhores experiencias gamísticas que eu já tive.
O jogo é um puzzle em primeira pessoa, com elementos de plataforma e shooter. Você tem uma arma de portais, que pode disparar um portal azul e outro laranja. Ao entrar no portal azul, você sai pelo laranja e vice-versa. O mérito do jogo é criar puzzles desafiadores, bem pensados e criativos com essa mecânica.

É um jogo curto, mas ainda sim memorável, original, complexo e inteligente.
A historia e ambientação do jogo é sensacional, textos escritos nas paredes, a GladOS falando e o cenario em si dá tudo o que o jogador precisa para imergir naquele mundo, não precisa de cutscenes de 2 horas para contar uma história.
Falando em GladOS, melhor vilã dos games.

Para quem está lendo este review e nunca jogou Portal, faça um favor para si mesmo e jogue. Eu recomendo este game para qualquer pessoa, independente de que gênero de jogo goste. Portal uma experiência única que todos deveriam experimentar.

Portal is one of my all time favorite games, it allows the player to work through the puzzles at whatever pace is neccessary. while the geme is fairly simple in its concept it provides some fairly complex puzzles and challenges for the player. as you finish this game and move on to portal 2 youll be able to create your own test chambers and have friends test them, these can also be posted to the steam comunity. Great game

Helloooo guys, once again, I strike with a review, and for the sake of good old Uncle Sam, it's in English.
So, [strike]"let's stop talking and do some walking"[/strike]. Portal is a game in where you play as the protagonis [b] Chell [/b], a woman who wakes up in the middle of the Aperture Science Enrichment Center (mentioned in Half Life series) and your task is simple : Testing. What you are testing is not motherfucking Cosmetic products, nope, you're testing a motherfreaking [b] PORTAL GUN![/b], yeah, you heard me right, you are freaking testing a GUN, that makes PORTALS, how can that be not holy AWESOME? now put your pants back on, you masturbating glee fan, and get your freaking wallet so you can buy this game already. 

Here I point out some reasons to play Portal:

[table]
    [tr]
        [th]Resons:[/th]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Reason 1[/td]
        [td]Fucking Awesome voice acting, if GLaDOS can't make you laugh from her sarcastic quotes, you're a cold hearthed basstard.[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
    [td]Reason 2[/td]
        [td]When you were a kid you wanted to have a device that created portals [strike]and Emma Watson's to be your girlfriend[/strike] just admit it, I won't judge[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
   [td]Reason 3[/td]
        [td][spoiler] THE CAKE IS A LIE!!!!!!!! [/spoiler][/td]
    [/tr]
[/table]

If there is any point on this review in where you disagree, leave a comment below. If my review hurt your feelings in any possible way, Fuck yourself, see a Psychologist, and THEN leave a comment below, just be nice k? ;)

I recomend this game. It is innovative, challenging, and just plain fun! 11/10
[h1] Valve e seus jogos inexplicáveis. [/h1]

Pour pouvoir poser vos mains sur Portal, deux choix vous seront offerts, l'acheter séparément pour une vingtaine de dollars sur Steam (soit environ 15 euros) ou l'avoir plus ou moins gratuitement dans un pack Orange Box. Vu sa durée de vie, on conseillera plutôt cette seconde option. Par certains aspects, Portal ne manquera pas de faire penser au film Cube, véritable ode à l'absurde. En substance, vous vous éveillez dans une cellule vitrée, chichement équipée. Une voix cybernétique aux accents peu sûrs et trébuchants commence alors à s'adresser à vous, vous indiquant vaguement comment faire vos premiers pas dans la série de tests du Centre D'Activité d'Enrichissement Personnel. Cette voix, appartenant à une intelligence artificielle, sorte de HAL en plus féminin, ne vous quittera plus, gardant en permanence un oeil sur vous via les caméras de sécurité, vous parlant constamment. Elle tentera de vous mentir gauchement, de plaisanter de son intonation saccadée d'horloge parlante ou même de vous encourager et de vous rassurer en vous garantissant qu'à l'issue du test, vous aurez droit à un gâteau, une fête et à un soutien psychologique. Sa simple présence vaut déjà la peine de tenter l'aventure Portal tant elle enchaîne les absurdités et les répliques pleine de cynisme grinçant.
It is a waste of your money, it is a very short game, and it gets boring after a while, so DONT GET IT!

Portal ist ohne zu lügen eines der besten Spiele die ich je gespielt habe.
Und das nicht wegen der Grafik, oder der vielen Memes mit dem Kuchen...
Mit Portal hat Valve seit langem mal wieder ein Spiel auf den Markt gebracht, das es SO einfach noch nicht gab.
Far Cry, Battlefield, Call of Dutty, Counterstrike... alles das Selbe: rumlaufen, schießen, Waffen aufsammeln...
Portal kommt (fast) ganz ohne Waffen aus.
Lediglich die Portal-Gun hilft dabei die Rätsel zu lösen und zum Ausgang der Testkammern zu gelangen.
Untermalt werden die Tests bis zum großen Plot-Twist mit sarkastischen Kommentaren des Roboters, welcher die Tests leitet und einem immer wieder vorwirft, was für eine Blamage für die menschliche Rasse man ist. ;-)

Wer auf Sarkasmus und Spiele mit tollen Storys steht, oder einfach wissen will, was es mit dem Kuchen auf sich hat, dem ist Portal (und Portal 2) wärmstens zu empfehlen.

...Belohnt wird man beim Durchspielen übrigens in beiden Teilen jeweils mit einem einzigartig tollem Song, der während der Credits läuft.
thats it? well was fun while it lasted

The game is obviously a physics puzzle game, one that I would seriously recommend to newcomers of the Portal series, as it fills you in on what happens in the first game that seems to be referenced a lot in Portal 2. IMO The physics are very accurate, but it's just a N-body simulation, so-so.

ce jeu est le monde entier!! il est coooooooooolllllll et dur un peu

I'm late on my review(and I was technically late playing this game) but I'd say can't hurt, anyway.

I knew when I saw this game in action it was gonna be sick. The idea of an FPS that didn't actually have you shooting or killing anyone was extremely refreshing. The puzzle elements were also very unique and there have been countless games inspired by this gem. Many have tried to emulate the masterpiece that is Portal. Many have failed to live up to it's standards. The game isn't perfect but it sure as hell is close.

This should easily go down as one of the best in gaming history because the cake indeed is a lie.

A fun and challenging puzzle game

This game is one of the best I've played of the Valve series, it runs really well on my PC, it's funny, it's challenging and on top of that, I get to fall through an endless void, land on the ground and not die! What else is there to say?

The bad thing is when you know what to do, it takes 90 (maybe more or less) minutes to complete the game, but I mean that's only because I knew what to do, for those who don't know it's gonna be a lot longer to complete!

Overall, fantastic game!

9/10
